not-a-function.png.description: u-shaped graph opening to the right

curve-angle-distance.png.description: a tight cluster of points around an invisible parabola
curve-angle-distance.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using Pyret with data from MLB.com

curve-angle-distance-linear1.png.description: a tight cluster of points around a parabola, with a diagonal line cutting through the left side of the point cloud
curve-angle-distance-linear1.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using Pyret with data from MLB.com

curve-angle-distance-linear2.png.description: a tight cluster of points around a parabola, with a diagonal line cutting through the right side of the point cloud
curve-angle-distance-linear2.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using Pyret with data from MLB.com

curve-angle-distance-linear3.png.description: a tight cluster of points around a parabola, with a horizontal line cutting through the point cloud
curve-angle-distance-linear3.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using Pyret with data from MLB.com

judge-angle-v-distance.png.description: a scatter plot of bat angle vs hit distance with points clustering around an invisible upside down U
judge-angle-v-distance.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using Pyret with data from MLB.com
judge-angle-v-distance.png.caption: bat-angle v hit-distance

judge-angle-v-speed.png.description: a scatter plot of bat angle vs hit speed, with points scattered in no particular order, although mostly in the upper left corner
judge-angle-v-speed.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using Pyret with data from MLB.com
judge-angle-v-speed.png.caption: bat-angle v hit-speed

judge-pitchspeed-v-distance.png.description: a scatter plot of pitch speed v hit distance, with points scattered in no particular order, although mostly on the right half of the graph

judge-pitchspeed-v-distance.png.caption: pitch-speed v hit-distance

judge-pitchspeed-v-speed.png.description: a scatter plot of pitch peedvs hit distance, with points scattered in no particular order, although mostly in the upper right corner
judge-pitchspeed-v-speed.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using Pyret with data from MLB.com
judge-pitchspeed-v-speed.png.caption: pitch-speed v hit-speed

fuel-efficiency-scatter.png.description: a tight cluster of points around an invisible parabola, with a poorly-fitting linear model plotted on top
fuel-efficiency-scatter.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team using Pyret based on fictional data, which was derived from real fuel efficiency numbers
